name: client-test
description: A test client for the Kui

scripts.preinstall: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; (cd ../../ && npm ci && npm run pack)
scripts.pty:rebuild: if [ -d node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch ]; then cd node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch && npm run install; fi
scripts.pty:electron: if [ -d node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch ]; then if [ ! -e node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc ]; then cp node_modules/@kui-shell/builder/npmrc node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc && npm run pty:rebuild; fi; fi
scripts.pty:nodejs: if [ -e node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc ]; then rm -f node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc; npm run pty:rebuild; fi
scripts.start: npm run -s compile && npm run -s pty:electron && electron . shell

author: Mengting Yan
